alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 14 at 4:02AM CDT until October 14 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR AREAS ROUGHLY ALONG AND SOUTH OF A LINE FROM GOTHENBURG...TO AURORA...TO GENEVA...AND INTO NORTH CENTRAL KANSAS... * WINDS...Northwest winds turning to the north-northwest by early evening. Sustained speeds of 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph are expected. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 percent. The lowest relative humidity values of 15 to 20 percent are expected to develop across portions of the area along and south of a line roughly from Gothenburg, NE to Mankato, KS. * IMPACTS...Any fires that ignite may spread rapidly and exhibit extreme fire behavior. Use extreme caution if engaging in activities that could result in fire ignition.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith
